name: Converging Heart
description:
Explore your past traumas in healthy ways by rediscovering the things that brought you joy through the hardest parts of your life. Connect with your past self in a whole new way that makes it easier to bear the difficulties of what came before. Converging Heart is a story about finding ways to love who you are and how that can allow you to fill a void that may be missing in your heart. Though this title covers very difficult topics, it is meant to allow for a conversation about mental health and what self-love means to each and every one of us. If you are having a hard time please reach out to (988 Suicide and Crisis Lifeline)

Controls:

 Keyboard Move with A/D or left/right arrow keys

 Jump with W or space

 Interact with E

 Controller

 Move with left analog stick

 Jump with B/Y

 Interact with A/X
